function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Urbanization, urban sprawl, and high population densities are associated with Vector-Borne Disease (VBD) emergence.","Impact":"Increased transmission of VBD due to environmental changes and human behavior.","Mitigation":"Implement urban planning strategies to reduce urban sprawl and manage population density. Raise awareness and education regarding VBD prevention.","Technologies":"Urban planning tools, GIS mapping, public health campaigns.","People":"Urban residents, local authorities, public health organizations.","Owner":"Local authorities, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Habitat encroachment and destruction lead to displacement of wild animals, affecting exposure patterns to infectious pathogens.","Impact":"Increased risk of novel pathogens spreading to human populations.","Mitigation":"Conservation efforts to protect natural habitats and prevent encroachment. Research to understand and monitor pathogen spread.","Technologies":"GIS mapping, satellite imagery, wildlife monitoring technologies.","People":"Conservation organizations, researchers, local communities.","Owner":"Conservation organizations, research institutions."},{"Description":"Social and demographic changes, including demographic shifts and social inequality, lead to disproportionate vulnerability to infectious diseases.","Impact":"Disproportionate impact on socially and economically disadvantaged groups from infectious diseases.","Mitigation":"Address social inequality, improve access to healthcare, and provide targeted education and resources for vulnerable populations.","Technologies":"Healthcare access programs, education and awareness campaigns, social support systems.","People":"Socially and economically disadvantaged groups, public health organizations, policymakers.","Owner":"Policymakers, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Lack of adequate surveillance systems to cope with the arrival and dispersal of tropical pathogens associated with warmer temperatures.","Impact":"Inadequate preparedness for the spread of tropical pathogens due to climate change.","Mitigation":"Enhance surveillance systems for early detection of tropical pathogens, invest in research and development for tropical disease response.","Technologies":"Disease surveillance technologies, data analytics, climate modeling.","People":"Public health agencies, researchers, policymakers.","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions."},{"Description":"Contamination of blood products from donors infected with known or unknown pathogens represents a significant threat to the blood supply and public health.","Impact":"Risk to the blood supply and public health due to contamination by known or unknown pathogens.","Mitigation":"Improve screening and testing protocols for blood products, enhance biosafety measures in blood supply management.","Technologies":"Blood screening technologies, pathogen detection assays, biosafety equipment.","People":"Blood donation organizations, healthcare professionals, public health authorities.","Owner":"Blood donation organizations, public health authorities."}]}
